name: Left Side Down
description:
Left Side Down is a very short, geometric platformer created in less than 72 hours for GeoJam2022.  Play on either the top or the bottom of the screen to experience the same level in a different way!

TW: This game contains bright and sometimes flashing lights, which may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy.  Player discretion is advised.

Notes: Added WebGL build after jam deadline, but the game is the same :)
